html:
I know where I end
And where reality begins
Flowers bloom pretty
In all of the gardens
Bees do their work
This is just something they do
Sun drops bright light
Everywhere around
Some want to give medals
Other to rob me instead
I’m loosing a part
A part of my freedom
And maybe one night
When the moon shines
I’ll kiss a beauty like her
Like fire that blazes straws
title: Moon
